skills.name: Lightning Horn
skills.description: Attacks and Stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 25% chance.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Inevitable Wound
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 4 times and removes 1 beneficial effect each. Inflicts Continuous Damage for 1 turn if you succeed in removing the beneficial effect.
skills.level_progress_description:
Shield +5%

Shield +10%

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Soaring Wings (Passive)
skills.description: Increases your Attack Bar by 25% with each attack if you land a Critical Hit. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skills.name: Transformation: Mystical Creature
skills.description: Turns back into the Mystical Creature. Instantly gains another turn, afterwards.
